attributes.action: To seek that the UK applies to becomes a part of The Republic of Ireland.
attributes.background: To seek that the UK becomes a part of The Republic of Ireland so they can get around the backstop remain in the EU.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for the people of the UK and the Republic of Ireland, not the UK Government and Parliament.
 
You could start a new petition about something that the UK Parliament and Government are responsible for.
